name: Cyberpunk 2077
description: A dystopian open-world RPG where you play as a mercenary in the neon-lit streets of Night City.

name: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: An epic story of outlaws and the Wild West, with breathtaking visuals and a deep narrative.

name: Elden Ring
description: A fantasy action RPG that blends the expertise of FromSoftware with a vast, open world and a rich lore.

name: Hogwarts Legacy
description: Step into the wizarding world and live out your own magical adventure as a young wizard at Hogwarts.

name: Among Us
description: A multiplayer social deduction game where players work together to complete tasks while trying to identify the Impostor.

name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: A mature, story-driven RPG featuring Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter on a quest to find his adopted daughter.

name: Baldur's Gate 3
description: A deep, story-rich RPG set in the Dungeons & Dragons universe with tactical combat and cooperative multiplayer.

name: Starfield
description: An open-world space exploration RPG where you create your own character and explore the galaxy.

name: Assassin's Creed Mirage
description: A return to the roots of the Assassin's Creed franchise with a stealth-focused action adventure set in Baghdad.

name: Resident Evil 4 Remake
description: A modernized remake of the classic survival horror game with overhauled graphics and gameplay.
